name: Dark Square Tabs for FireFox [Tabs on bottom]
description: Modified the Style "Modern Square Tabs for Firefox Australis" by varinys to get a nice dark theme when you're using Classic Theme Restorer, "Tabs not on top"/"Tabs on bottom", and a dark accent color in Windows 8/10 (30, 30, 30 RGB).
additional_info: Firefox uses a black font for the main URL address (e.g. 'google.com') and grey fonts for additions to the URL (e.g. 'htt​ps://maps.google.com/') To make all fonts black and better visiable go to about:config and change 'browser.urlbar.formatting.enabled' to 'false'
